name: Passerby (Aaron King)
description:
Gameplay

Conduct the train as you travel between the real world and wonderland. At each station you arrive at, you can choose who you pick up from each location. Every passenger you encounter has the amount they'll pay, their happiness, and the possibility of a special trait. The passengers you pick up and drop off all affect your reputation and gold so your choices must be balanced with the consequences.

The goal is to be able to get enough money to pay off the Toll Troll at the end of each level, being unable to pay this toll results in the end of the game.

Controls

Most controls are point and click

Space - Zoom Out/Zoom In

X - Train Whistle

Contributors

Aaron King - Programming

Jack Grace - Programming

Jayden Sansom - Art
